tutorials.title: Creating a New User
tutorials.description: Learn how to add new users to the system.

media.description: Navigate to 'Manage Users' from the navigation bar.
media.additionalNotes: Ensure you have the required permissions: USER_READ, USER_CREATE, USER_UPDATE.

media.description: Select the role of the user you want to manage, e.g., Admin.
Click the 'Add User' button in the toolbar to open the modal dialog.
Fill in the user details in the form.
Submit the form to add the new user and see the results.
